bioconda.name: bioconductor-bader
bioconda.summary: Bayesian Analysis of Differential Expression in RNA Sequencing Data

biotools.summary: For RNA sequencing count data, this tool fits a Bayesian hierarchical model. Its algorithm returns the posterior probability of differential expression for each gene between two groups A and B. The joint posterior distribution of the variables in the model can be returned in the form of posterior samples, which can be used for further down-stream analyses such as gene set enrichment.
